body.p: This is the content of this example document. This will become the content of the HTML page generated during the Isis build.

bibliography.title: Example of an Inline Content Single Page Document
bibliography.brief: Example of a Document metadata file that generates a single web page
bibliography.description: Example of a Document metadata file that will generate a single page document from HTML formatted content included in the file
bibliography.author: Deborah Lee Soltesz
